trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The eccentric creator has a request for Azem's familiar.
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_TODO_00<tab>Use fine aetheric rope to capture restless plants.
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bound plants to the eccentric creator.
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_000<tab>You must be Azem's familiar. I had a favor to ask of the observers here, but seeing as they all seem awfully preoccupied, perhaps I can ask you instead.

TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_001<tab>I'm experimenting with crossbreeding different types of plants. I was thrilled when I finally produced a whole new species...right up until the point where they rose up and floated away.

TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_002<tab>Last I saw of them, they were headed toward the eastern side of the island. I managed to wrangle a goodly number, but there are still eight or so missing. Could you help me recapture them?
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_003<tab>Thank you. Here, use this aetheric rope to capture say, four of them, and I can hopefully handle the rest.
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_006<tab>Thank goodness for that, though I'd expect no less from Azem's familiar. I rounded up my half as well, which means they're all back safe and sound.
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_007<tab>They're part yggdreant, you see. It's no surprise they inherited the eyes, but having them wander off on their own was rather unexpected.

TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_008<tab>To tell the truth, I never really had a specific use in mind for them. I suppose I'd best start thinking about that... The Bureau of the Architect won't be impressed with my new creation unless it serves a purpose.
TEXT_AKTKZH002_04297_STAFF04297_000_009<tab>With that in mind, I believe there's research to be done. Thank you for your help, and do pass on my regards to Azem.
